sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-us', templateUrl: './contact-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-us.component.css'] }) export class ContactUsComponent { onSubmit() { // Handle form submission logic here // For example, you can send the data to your backend or display a message alert('Your message has been sent! We will get back to you shortly.'); } }
